transcripts.text: Hello, family.  Stephen Darby Ministries will be holding a two-day conference in Miami, Florida, Thursday, August 1, 2019, at 7  p.m.,  and Saturday, August 3, at 1  p.m.,  at the Embassy Suites by Hilton Miami International Airport, 3974 Northwest South River Drive.  The Destin Ministries Praise and Worship Team will be bringing in the anointed worship, and the Destin Prayer Team will be on hand to pray for anyone in need of prayer.  If you would like to attend, please go to stephendarbyministries.com to register.  Children 12 and under are free.  Porking is $5 each day.  We hope to see you there, and be blessed.
